channel.title: New Runescape Privet server Project, Serious Project!
channel.description:
Ok i want to start a Privet server, but im gona need as much help as possible!!!
Hopefully we can make it like Real RS as much as possible, with as many working skills as we can. Also we would have membership, All of Real Runescape would be free... plus paying members would get get stuff, that is'nt in Real Runescape, but is in our privet server. All people that have been applyed and have been accepted will be payed some REAL money, ammount that you will be paid depends on the months takings.
Base server code: Undecided Servername: Undecided Server Ip: Not hosted at the moment Current version: N/A Official website: N/A
Apply for a place: Current jobs: Website designer Server coders Server Hoster And anyting else i have missed!!! (lol can't think, of any more)
[code=actionscript]
Name: (enter your fourm name here) What you would like to do: (job you would like here) Have you ever had any coding experiance:(Yes/No) If so what have you coded: (list stuff you have coded here)
Data applyed for: (enter date here) [/code]
